I got an invite to buy one last week and ordered it immediately. It arrived yesterday, and it's so fast and responsive and customisable and elegant. I love it.

ETA: I have just been given some invites to giveaway. PM me if interested...

Hmm...

I hit my head because I slipped on a mini soccer ball. It was quite painful in fact.

That's actually the coolest phone on the market right now Nibb31.

Er, sorry to undermine your thread.
I tore down and rebuilt my PC. One of the PCI slots is still broken.

Feel free to post your own brags and stuff that only you care about but that you still want to share...

I'm afraid there's not enough room on the forums for me to do that.
I am hungry and I need to pee.

Here's MY new phone }B^]

(picture from Google...)

My iPhone 3g got the white screen, this time for good... so i needed a quick replacement. Cost me something like 35$.

And I love it as if it was my child!!! :-)

And I love it as if it was my child!!! :-)

Not only was it quick, It's a nokia. That means you if you drop it, the sidewalk cracks.
I just discovered how to make something travel anywhere through time and space. Nothing much.

Earlier this year I ditched Verizon and got an ZTE Valet (Android) Tracfone. Aside from a crappy camera, it does everything the Droid Razr did and saves me $70/mo.

Also, my dogs breath smells like dog food.
